Letterpest

Letterpest is an application that was made for fun. It helps you cheat on the game Letterpress. Letterpest allows you to take a screenshot of your board, upload it to the application, and find out the various word combinations you can use to beat your opponent.

Role

I designed the product and mobile site.

Teammates

Jesse Bounds and Mick Thompson
